gmos/

uhsf_gm_fitspec.pro


top uhsf_gm_fitspec

UHSPECFIT/GMOS

uhsf_gm_fitspec, gal, bin [, cols=dblarr] [, rows=dblarr] [, fibers=byte] [, sky=byte] [, verbose=byte]

This procedure is the core routine to fit the continuum and emission lines of a spectrum.

As input, it requires a structure of initializaiton parameters. The tags for this structure can be found in ...

Parameters

gal in required type=string
bin in required type=double

Keywords

cols in optional type=dblarr
rows in optional type=dblarr
fibers in optional type=byte
sky in optional type=byte
verbose in optional type=byte

Author information

Author:

David Rupke
